rooms.name: Entrance Hall and Lobby
rooms.description: A welcoming open space with minimalist design, featuring floor-to-ceiling windows for natural light. Designed as a transitional area between the exterior balcony and interior living spaces.

rooms.name: Living Room & Kitchen
rooms.description: An integrated space that includes an open-plan kitchen with modern minimalist cabinetry, and a spacious living area accentuated by floor-to-ceiling windows. Incorporates Vastu principles for harmonious energy flow.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Adjacent to the kitchen, this dining space offers a modern minimalist design with a farm-inspired aesthetic, utilizing natural materials and ample light.

rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.description: A functional yet elegantly designed bathroom that aligns with minimalist principles. Vastu considerations ensure water elements are placed correctly.

rooms.name: Bedroom 1 (Penthouse Studio)
rooms.description: The main living space, functioning as a penthouse studio apartment farmhouse style, featuring floor-to-ceiling windows and an attached spacious balcony for relaxation and natural light. Vastu principles guide the placement of the bed and other furniture to ensure positive energy flow.

rooms.name: Private Gym
rooms.description: A dedicated private gym area within the apartment, featuring modern minimalist design with functional equipment space. Open-plan with floor-to-ceiling windows for ventilation and natural lighting, ensuring a conducive workout environment while adhering to Vastu principles.

rooms.name: Storage
rooms.description: Sufficient storage integrated into the living area, designed to maintain a clutter-free minimalist aesthetic.

openings.description: Spacious balconies providing panoramic views and natural light, designed with privacy screens that reflect the farmhouse aesthetic.
Large glass panels ensuring maximum natural light penetration and ventilation throughout the apartment.
